H0.text: Percolation is the downward movement of water through pores and other spaces in soil due to the force of gravity.

H1.text: Evaporation is the downward movement of water through pores and other spaces in soil due to the force of gravity.

H2.text: Precipitation is the downward movement of water through pores and other spaces in soil due to the force of gravity.

H3.text: Condensation is the downward movement of water through pores and other spaces in soil due to the force of gravity.
